statements: SELECT * FROM WineTastingNotes
SELECT wine_name, region FROM WineTastingNotes WHERE vintage_year = 2020
SELECT id, expert_name, region FROM WineTastingNotes ORDER BY expert_name ASC
SELECT * FROM WineTastingNotes WHERE region = 'Napa Valley' AND vintage_year > 2015
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM WineTastingNotes
SELECT * FROM WineTastingNotes WHERE region='Napa Valley';
SELECT expert_name, wine_name, vintage_year FROM WineTastingNotes WHERE vintage_year > 2015 ORDER BY vintage_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM WineTastingNotes WHERE flavor_notes LIKE '%fruity%' AND region='Bordeaux' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT expert_name, COUNT(*) AS num_notes FROM WineTastingNotes GROUP BY expert_name HAVING num_notes > 2 ORDER BY num_notes DESC;
SELECT region, COUNT(*) AS num_wines FROM WineTastingNotes GROUP BY region HAVING num_wines > 1 ORDER BY num_wines DESC;
SELECT * FROM wine_tasting_notes;
SELECT expert_name, wine_name, vintage FROM wine_tasting_notes WHERE region = 'Napa Valley';
SELECT * FROM wine_tasting_notes WHERE vintage >= 2015 ORDER BY expert_name;
SELECT wine_name, tasting_notes FROM wine_tasting_notes WHERE region = 'Bordeaux' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT theme_name, description FROM common_themes;
SELECT * FROM wine_tasting_notes WHERE region = 'Napa Valley' ORDER BY vintage DESC;
SELECT expert_name, wine_name, region FROM wine_tasting_notes WHERE expert_name = 'Jane Doe' AND region = 'Bordeaux' ORDER BY vintage ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT region FROM wine_tasting_notes;
SELECT wine_name, tasting_notes FROM wine_tasting_notes WHERE tasting_notes LIKE '%fruity%' ORDER BY vintage DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM common_themes WHERE theme_name IN ('Fruit-forward', 'Earthy tones');
SELECT id, expert_name, wine_name, tasting_notes FROM wine_tasting_notes;
SELECT wine_name, vintage_year, tasting_notes, expert_name FROM wine_tasting_notes;
SELECT expert_name, wine_name, tasting_notes, vintage_year FROM wine_tasting_notes;
SELECT id, wine_name, tasting_notes FROM wine_tasting_notes WHERE vintage_year > 2010;
SELECT expert_name, tasting_notes FROM wine_tasting_notes WHERE wine_name = 'Chardonnay';
SELECT * FROM wine_tasting_notes;
SELECT wine_name, tasting_notes FROM wine_tasting_notes WHERE expert_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_wine_tastings FROM wine_tasting_notes;
SELECT * FROM expert_ratings ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT wine_name, rating FROM expert_ratings JOIN wine_tasting_notes ON expert_ratings.wine_id = wine_tasting_notes.id WHERE expert_ratings.expert_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM wine_experts;
SELECT name, expertise_level FROM wine_experts ORDER BY expertise_level DESC;
SELECT id, name, year, region FROM wines WHERE region = 'France';
SELECT note, rating FROM tasting_notes WHERE expert_id = 1;
SELECT theme_name, description FROM common_themes WHERE theme_name LIKE 'Wine%';
SELECT * FROM wines WHERE region='France';
SELECT id, name, year FROM wines WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT name, expertise_level FROM wine_experts WHERE expertise_level='Master Sommelier';
SELECT tn.note, tn.rating, w.name FROM tasting_notes tn JOIN wines w ON tn.wine_id=w.id WHERE tn.rating >= 90;
SELECT ct.theme_name, ct.description FROM common_themes ct ORDER BY theme_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM expert_notes WHERE rating > 90;
SELECT expert_name, wine_name, rating FROM expert_notes WHERE region = 'Bordeaux';
SELECT wine_name, vintage, region FROM wine_details ORDER BY vintage DESC;
SELECT expert_name, theme_name, preference_score FROM expert_preferences WHERE preference_score >= 0.5;
SELECT note_id, theme_id FROM theme_notes LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM expert_notes;
SELECT expert_name, wine_name, rating FROM expert_notes WHERE rating > 90;
SELECT expert_name, wine_name, region FROM expert_notes WHERE region = 'Napa Valley';
SELECT DISTINCT expert_name FROM expert_notes;
SELECT expert_name, theme_name FROM expert_notes JOIN expert_preferences ON expert_notes.expert_name = expert_preferences.expert_name;
